title: Gene Colan Tribute (2008) #1 (IRON MAN COVER)
description:
In conjunction with the Hero Initiative, Marvel’s top creators select their favorite stories featuring the groundbreaking artwork of Gene Colan – reprinted here in their entirety – and offer commentary on his prolific contributions to the comic-book industry, from TOMB OF DRACULA to DAREDEVIL to HOWARD THE DUCK!

The Hero Initiative is the first-ever federally chartered not-for-profit corporation dedicated strictly to helping comic book creators in need. Hero creates a financial safety net for yesterdays' creators who may need emergency medical aid, financial support for essentials of life, and an avenue back into paying work. Net proceeds from sales of this book by The Hero Initiative will benefit Gene Colan.
96 PGS./Rated T+ …$9.99
